name: spidermonkey-wasm
description: Run JavaScript in an isolated sandbox using Spidermonkey engine compiled to WebAssembly.

scripts.compile-guest: npx esbuild --target=firefox125 --bundle --outfile=src-guest/boot.js src-guest/boot.ts && npx tsx tools/file-to-literal.ts src-guest/*.js
scripts.perf: npx tsx tools/gen-perf.ts && npx esbuild --target=firefox125 --platform=node --bundle --outfile=perf/src/run.js perf/src/run.ts && npx tsx perf/src/compile-bundle.ts && node perf/src/run.js
